history.proof: intros b b0 b1 H. unfold leb. destruct b0; destruct b1; try reflexivity. - qsimpl time: 1 use: orb_inc_r. - qsimpl time: 1 use: orb_inc_r. - hauto lq: on depth: 3use: orb_inc_r.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall b b0 b1 : bool, leb b0 b1 -> leb (b0 || b) (b1 || b)

Premises:
leb = fun b0 b1 : bool => if b0 then if b1 then True else False else if b1 then True else True : bool -> bool -> Prop Argument scopes are [bool_scope bool_scope]
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
andb_inc_l : forall b b0 b1 : bool, leb b0 b1 -> leb (b0 && b) (b1 && b)
orb_inc_r : forall b b0 b1 : bool, leb b0 b1 -> leb (b || b0) (b || b1)
andb_inc_r : forall b b0 b1 : bool, leb b0 b1 -> leb (b && b0) (b && b1)
lem_get_leb : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad) (b0 b1 : bool), lem m0 m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some b0 -> MapGet bool m1 a = Some b1 -> leb b0 b1
ssrbool.orb_andr = fun __top_assumption_ : bool => (fun (_evar_0_ : (fun b : bool => forall y z : bool, b || y && z = (b || y) && (b || z)) true) (_evar_0_0 : (fun b : bool => forall y z : bool, b || y && z = (b || y) && (b || z)) false) => if __top_assumption_ as b return ((fun b0 : bool => forall y z : bool, b0 || y && z = (b0 || y) && (b0 || z)) b) then _evar_0_ else _evar_0_0) (fun __top_assumption_0 : bool => (fun (_evar_0_ : (fun b : bool => forall z : bool, true || b && z = (true || b) && (true || z)) true) (_evar_0_0 : (fun b : bool => forall z : bool, true || b...
leb_transitive : forall a b c : bool, leb a b -> leb b c -> leb a c
absorption_andb : forall b1 b2 : bool, b1 && (b1 || b2) = b1
leb_antisymmetric : forall b c : bool, leb b c -> leb c b -> b = c
orb_andb_distrib_r : forall b1 b2 b3 : bool, b1 || b2 && b3 = (b1 || b2) && (b1 || b3)
orb_andb_distrib_l : forall b1 b2 b3 : bool, b1 && b2 || b3 = (b1 || b3) && (b2 || b3)
N.add3_bits_div2 : forall a0 b0 c0 : bool, ((N.b2n a0 + N.b2n b0 + N.b2n c0) / 2)%N = N.b2n (a0 && b0 || c0 && (a0 || b0))
Nat.add3_bits_div2 : forall a0 b0 c0 : bool, (Nat.b2n a0 + Nat.b2n b0 + Nat.b2n c0) / 2 = Nat.b2n (a0 && b0 || c0 && (a0 || b0))
negb_andb : forall b1 b2 : bool, negb (b1 && b2) = negb b1 || negb b2
negb_orb : forall b1 b2 : bool, negb (b1 || b2) = negb b1 && negb b2
Reflect.orE : forall b1 b2 : bool, is_true (b1 || b2) < -> is_true b1 \/ is_true b2
andb_orb_distrib_l : forall b1 b2 b3 : bool, (b1 || b2) && b3 = b1 && b3 || b2 && b3
ssrbool.orb_idl : forall a b : bool, (is_true a -> is_true b) -> a || b = b
ssrbool.orTb : forall b : bool, is_true (true || b)
leb_reflexive : forall b : bool, leb b b
ssrbool.orb_id2r : forall a b c : bool, (is_true (negb b) -> a = c) -> a || b = c || b
orb_prop_elim : forall a b : bool, Is_true (a || b) -> Is_true a \/ Is_true b
orb_prop_intro : forall a b : bool, Is_true a \/ Is_true b -> Is_true (a || b)
orb_comm : forall b1 b2 : bool, b1 || b2 = b2 || b1
BinInt.Z.add3_bits_div2 : forall a0 b0 c0 : bool, BinInt.Z.div (BinInt.Z.add (BinInt.Z.add (BinInt.Z.b2z a0) (BinInt.Z.b2z b0)) (BinInt.Z.b2z c0)) (Zpos 2) = BinInt.Z.b2z (a0 && b0 || c0 && (a0 || b0))
orb_assoc : forall b1 b2 b3 : bool, b1 || (b2 || b3) = b1 || b2 || b3

```coq
intros b b0 b1 H.
unfold leb.
destruct b0; destruct b1; try reflexivity.
- apply orb_inc_r. assumption.
- apply orb_inc_r. assumption.
Qed.```
